title: Microwave Phase Stable Cable 70% VP
content: High-quality coaxial cable engineered for stable and efficient signal transmission in microwave applications.

title: Microwave Phase Stable Cable 77% VP
content: High-quality coaxial cable engineered for stable and efficient signal transmission in microwave applications.

title: Twinax Cable
content: High-speed, low-latency cable suited for short-distance data transmission, used in data centers and network applications requiring rapid, secure signal integrity.

title: Custom Made Cable
content: Fully tailored cable solutions built to precise specifications, offering specialized functionality, material choice, and performance characteristics to meet unique industry and application requirements.
